page.title: 10A FARM IN SIBSEY.
page.content: One Friday morning we went to Bishops farm and spoke to{J.J.Grant.}We asked him some questions about his farm he has 1,800 acres.There are 12 full time workers and 1 part time.{ {************************************* {*wheat * 1000 acres {*barley * 250 acres {*peas * 200 acres {*beet * 150 acres {*potatoes* 120 acres {*grazing * 40 acres {************************************* This is a graph about how many acres J.J.Grant has got on his farm per crop On the clay land it is too sticky to grow potatoes and beet but this is how it goes to stop disease spreading { {peas, wheat, wheat, winter barley, {rape, wheat, wheat, spring barley. }
